summary: Will Hay is a teacher in a prison, who applies for the Headship of Narkover, a public school. This is the first screen appearance of Hay in his (to be ) famous schoolmaster role, in a story... See full summary Â»
cast: Will Hay|Gordon Harker|Jimmy Hanley|Davy Burnaby|Norma Varden|Claude Dampier|Charles Farrell|Percy Walsh|Clive Dunn|Peter Gawthorne|Charles Hawtrey|Basil McGrail|Leonard Sharp|Ben Williams
title: Boys Will Be Boys
